main.name: Yujen Su
main.description: If you are looking for someone who's passionate about coding. You come into the right place!
main.bio: A full stack developer with 3 years of experience. The experience includes building and launching a web application from scratch within 6 months. Building highly reusable and scalable code is one of my strength. I’m looking for positions which mainly focus on development of server-side logic and data manipulation.

education.degree: Master of Science in Electrical and Computer Engineering

work.title: Full Stack Developer
descriptions: Initiate and launch Clicktool’s marketing analytics platform from scratch
Design and organize the app architecture and database schema
Create back-end RESTful APIs with Node/Express/Stripe
Develop front-end UI with React/Redux, HTML, CSS, Javascript
Set up cloud integrations with AWS(EC2/ELB/RDS/R53)
Build new features to online stores with Shopify/jQuery

work.title: Process Engineer
descriptions: Boosted the productivity by development of new manufacturing processes
Optimization of production lines and elimination of errors

testimonials.text: Yujen is a really quick learner, he can pick up new things quickly and and adopt it to what we need for the projects with minimal guidance. throughout the years working with him, we've been in many engineering challenges, but with his good work-ethic, hard working, detail oriented we all know he will get it solved. he's a kind of developer that all the dev teams are looking for.

Yujen and I worked together frequently as backend and frontend developers (respectively). He architected much of the Clicktool software and emphasized clean and well-structured code. I came to Yujen often for code reviews and he was always happy to go over my work, process the logic, and make any suggestions. A couple of helpful things that Yujen introduced to me during our time working together is using conditional rendering in React components and using object-oriented design in backend development. I felt like I learned something new every time I come across the code he's written. I’m thankful that Yujen was a senior developer on our team as he has contributed to my coding knowledge greatly.
It was great working with Yujen - he is great at building out clean, scalable software solutions!
